title: With Whom Are You Going?
itunes:title: With Whom Are You Going?
description:
We’ve all gotten into Ghostwire Tokyo this week and thus we dissect our time in slightly spooky Shibuya, Vinny finished Tunic and has Thoughts (!), Alex and Brad are… still playing Stranger of Paradise, and we cover the latest news, including management issues at Moon Studios and Funomena, the fourth Witcher, , and… controllers with hair?!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spo
ilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:28) The less I think I about grammar the fewer headaches I get.
(00:10:30) That new Jackass movie
(00:15:36) The Games
(00:16:06) Ghostwire: Tokyo [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5] on Mar 25, 2022
(00:44:51) First Break
(00:44:56) Tunic [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One] on Mar 16, 2022
(00:58:36) Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin [PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Mar 18, 2022
(01:03:49) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(01:12:10) Second Break
(01:12:15) News
(01:12:30) Allegations of emotional abuse at various indie studios
(01:19:23) Ori studio workplace culture also in the news
(01:28:03) Gran Turismo 7 ignites controversy over currency
(01:36:15) A new Witcher game is being developed on Unreal 5
(01:46:36) There is no tower high enough for Ubisoft's dream worlds
(01:54:40) Intellivision's Amico is still out there
(01:58:57) Either the worst idea or best idea for a controller
(02:03:50) Wrapping up and thanks
(02:05:29) Mysterious Benefactor Shoutouts
(02:07:00) Nextlander content updates
(02:09:16) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
